opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Irvin, Individually and on Behalf of Her Minor Child, Irvin v. Hydrochem Inc., Ante, P. 976

opinion:
543 U.S. 1085

IRVIN, INDIVIDUALLY AND ON BEHALF OF HER MINOR CHILD, IRVIN, ET AL.
v.
HYDROCHEM INC. ET AL., ante, p. 976.

No. 04-237.

Supreme Court of United States.

January 10, 2005.

1

Petitions for rehearing denied. JUSTICE BREYER took no part in the consideration or decision of these petitions.
